casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Lewis, Appellant.
Submitted January 11, 1971.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and BarBIERI, JJ.
R. Barclay Surrich, Assistant Public Defender, for appellant.
Vram Nedurian Jr. and Ralph, B. D’lorio, Assistant District Attorneys, and Stephen J. McEwen, Jr., District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
October 12, 1971:
